channel.title: SWS:SE - Stars in the Dark
channel.description:
https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-Mldy7IqNeRuWKdYm39w
This game is part of the SWS:SE celebration of four years of Star Wars Saturdays!
This is a one-shot of Stars in the Dark, my Star Wars reskin of Blades in the Dark, scheduled for 18:00-21:00 GMT on Sunday December 5th.. More details in the link.
https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-Mldy7IqNeRuWKdYm39w
